Plot: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr Zorg at bay.
Title: The Fifth Element
Writer: Luc Besson (story), Luc Besson (screenplay), Robert Mark Kamen (screenplay)
Actors: Bruce Willis, Gary Oldman, Ian Holm, Milla Jovovich
tomatoConsensus: Visually inventive and gleefully over the top, Luc Besson's The Fifth Element is a fantastic piece of pop sci-fi that never takes itself too seriously.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 9 wins & 33 nominations.
